thread.title: Boy, 3, dies after being hit by tractor - ITV News
thread.title_full: Boy, 3, dies after being hit by tractor - ITV News

title: Boy, 3, dies after being hit by tractor - ITV News
text:
15 February 2017 at 10:30am Boy, 3, dies after being hit by tractor The accident happened in the village of Crossgates in Fife. Credit: Google street view 
A three-year-old boy has died after he was knocked down by a tractor on a farm in Fife. 
The incident happened at about 5.10pm on Tuesday in the village of Crossgates. 
The boy died at the scene and police are investigating. 
A Police Scotland spokesman said: "Police in Fife are investigating after a child was killed during a collision on a farm in Fife. 
"The incident happened around 5.10pm on Tuesday February 14 at a property in Crossgates. 
"A three-year-old boy sustained fatal injuries after he was involved in a collision with a farm vehicle and was pronounced dead at the scene. 
"Inquiries into the full circumstances surrounding this matter are continuing." Last updated Wed 15 Feb 2017
